au.edu.ausstage.utils
Class DateUtils

java.lang.Object
  au.edu.ausstage.utils.DateUtils

public class DateUtils
extends java.lang.Object

A class of methods useful when processing dates in AusStage Services

A method to get the last day of a month

Parameters:

Returns:
the last day of the specified month

getExplodedDate

public static java.lang.String[] getExplodedDate(java.lang.String date)
A method to explode a date in 8 digit format into the three components. Where a date component can not be determined null is used Array elements are [0] - year, [1] - month, [2] - day

Parameters:
date - the date to explode
Returns:
an array with three elements containing the date components

getExplodedDate

public static java.lang.String[] getExplodedDate(java.lang.String date,
                                                 java.lang.String delim)
A method to explode a date in 8 digit format into the three components. Where a date component can not be determined null is used Assumes the format yyyy-mm-dd where - is a delimiter Array elements are [0] - year, [1] - month, [2] - day

Parameters:
date - the date to explode
delim - the delimiter in the date components
Returns:
an array with three elements containing the date components

getMinifiedDate

public static java.lang.String getMinifiedDate(java.lang.String date,
                                               java.lang.String delim)
A method to "minify" a date by using zero in any missing values Assumes the format yyyy-mm-dd where - is a delimiter

Parameters:
date - the date to explode
delim - the delimiter in the date components
Returns:
an array with three elements containing the date components

getIntegerFromDate

public static int getIntegerFromDate(java.lang.String date,
                                     java.lang.String delim)
A method to convert a date string into an integer Assumes the format yyyy-mm-dd where - is a delimiter Dates are minified before conversion if required

Parameters:
date - the date to explode
delim - the delimiter in the date components
Returns:
an array with three elements containing the date components

getIntegerFromDate

public static int getIntegerFromDate(java.lang.String date)
A method to convert a date string into an integer Assumes the format yyyy-mm-dd where - is a delimiter Dates are minified before conversion if required

Parameters:
date - the date to explode
Returns:
an array with three elements containing the date components

getDatesForTimeline

public static java.lang.String[] getDatesForTimeline(java.lang.String fyear,
                                                     java.lang.String fmonth,
                                                     java.lang.String fday,
                                                     java.lang.String lyear,
                                                     java.lang.String lmonth,
                                                     java.lang.String lday)
A method to turn dates from AusStage into dates that can be used for sorting Used primarily to prepare data for use in the mapping service time slideer

Parameters:
fyear - the first year
fmonth - the first month
fday - the first day
lyear - the last year
lmonth - the last month
lday - the last day
Returns:
a two element string array, first element is the first date, the second is the last date

getDatesForTimeline

public static java.lang.String[] getDatesForTimeline(java.lang.String fdate,
                                                     java.lang.String ldate)
A method to turn dates from AusStage into dates that can be used for sorting Used primarily to prepare data for use in the mapping service time slideer

Parameters:
fdate - the first date
ldate - the last date
Returns:
a two element string array, first element is the first date, the second is the last date

getSortDate

public static java.lang.String getSortDate(java.lang.String fyear,
                                           java.lang.String fmonth,
                                           java.lang.String fday)
A method to turn dates from AusStage into dates that can be used for sorting Used primarily to prepare data for use in the mapping service time slideer

Parameters:
fyear - the first year
fmonth - the first month
fday - the first day
Returns:
the date that can be used for sorting, especially useful in the mapping service and the time slider
